aboutus_section.title: About us
aboutus_section.text: We are your Swiss partner for AI solutions. With passion, expertise and the highest data protection standards, we guide SMEs into the digital future. Rely on Swiss Made AI – personal, secure, efficient.

privacy_section.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_section.intro: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data on this website.
privacy_section.data_collection_text: We collect and process personal data only to the extent necessary and exclusively for the specified purposes.
privacy_section.your_rights_text: You have the right to information, correction, deletion and restriction of the processing of your personal data.
privacy_section.contact_text: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact us at info@kelepar.com
